trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the rendered text.
trans-unit.target: 指定呈现文本的大小。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The FontSize enumeration is a subset of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize?displayProperty=fullName>, and represents the size of a font in a container.
trans-unit.target: FontSize 枚举是的子集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize?displayProperty=fullName>，和表示容器中的字体的大小。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontSize?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control inside of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel> control, with the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel> control's font size set to Normal, you can specify a small font size for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>控件内部<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel>控件，与<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel>控件的字体大小设置为 Normal，你可以指定一个小字体大小进行<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: Font is larger than <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字体大于<xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Default font size.
trans-unit.target: 默认字体大小。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Default value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值。

trans-unit.source: If the value is NotSet, then the font's size is inherited from the control's style, or, if the style is not defined, from the control's parent control.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 NotSet，然后从控件的样式继承字体的大小或者，如果不定义样式，则从控件的父控件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Font is smaller than <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字体小于<xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>。
